aboutBrand.title: About the brand
aboutBrand.text: Nutva Pharm is a modern brand created for a healthy lifestyle, producing natural and effective biofuel supplements. Our main goal is to support human health, strengthen immunity and provide solutions that can benefit the body without harm. In 2020, Nutva Pharm began to be recognized in the markets of Uzbekistan, Central Asia and Russia through its first product, Nutva Complex. Initially, having studied the local market, products were created on the basis of special compositions suitable for the needs of customers. To date, the Nutva Pharm range has separate lines for children, women, men and seniors. We develop each product based on a thorough scientific approach, environmentally friendly raw materials and the best traditions of folk medicine. Nutva Pharm is not just a biofaol supplement, it is a philosophy of healthy living in the harmony of nature and science.

reviewSection.title: Real feedback from our customers
reviewSection.subtitle: Find out how NUTVA helps to improve the quality of life and achieve the desired results. Video reviews from those who have already tried our product confirm the effectiveness and quality.

1.title: Dancing at the age of 70!
1.description: After polyarthritis, gonarthrosis, and a herniated disc, I'm moving freely again![[BR]]A face-to-face meeting with a 70-year-old female farmer from the Pastdargom district of Samarkand region. Her serious health issues — spinal hernias, accumulated polyarthritis, knee joint degradation, seizures, and stomach ulcers — were all overcome with the help of Nutva Complex.[[BR]]This video is a true source of inspiration for those fighting pain!

2.title: Recovered from spondyloarthrosis without surgery
2.description: Our sister from Surkhandarya had injuries in 6 vertebrae.[[BR]]Doctors recommended surgery. But she didn't lose hope — and recovered without an operation![[BR]]🎥 This story proves that healing without surgery is possible.[[BR]]Watch the full video and draw your own conclusions![[BR]]A story that started with tears ended with a dance.

3.title: Healing in Samarkand — Nutva Complex results
3.description: Nutva founder Alijon G'aybullaev and his team of doctors welcomed over 100 people in Samarkand.[[BR]]They provided professional consultations and medical check-ups.[[BR]]Alijon G'aybullaev personally met with patients and listened to their heartfelt testimonials and real improvements after using Nutva Complex.

4.title: Paralysis, Morphine, Aseptic Necrosis — all left behind
4.description: Gulchehra apa from Furqat district of Fergana region became paralyzed due to a serious medical mistake. Her legs stopped moving, and she was bedridden, suffering not only from pain but also hopelessness.[[BR]]Today she is close to walking again and has regained faith in life. Healer Alijon G'aybullaev, Bahora Qodiralieva, and journalist Oybek Rixsibekov visited her at home to check on her condition.

5.title: Otinoyi relieved of 3-year leg pain
5.description: This herb is amazing, I feel lighter! I can't believe I got rid of the pain![[BR]]Our grandmother from Bekobod district, Tashkent region, had been waiting for us for months. She said she wanted to personally thank healer Alijon. For 3 years, she suffered from knee and leg pain that wouldn't even let her sleep. She couldn't climb stairs, but now she says she found healing and sincerely thanked the Nutva team and the healer.

1.1: A natural anti-parasitic complex for children. Helps combat worms, toxins, and skin issues.
1.2: Indov - 136.7 mg, Black asafoetida - 46.7 mg, Black comfrey - 37.7 mg, Yarrow - 12.5 mg, Pumpkin seed - 12.4 mg, Corn silk - 12.2 mg, Cinquefoil - 11.7 mg.
1.3:
2-5 years: 1 capsule. 5-16 years: 2 capsules. 16+ years: 3 capsules. To be taken before dinner. Recommended course: 3-6 months.

🔍 Uses (parasites):
• Ascaris - from cough to bronchitis, reproduces in intestines, risk of reinfection.
• Tapeworms - can live up to 30 years in intestines, migrate through body, dangerous to brain and heart.
• Giardia - transmitted via water, contaminated vegetables, contact; resides in the small intestine.
• Pinworms - cause anal itching, insomnia, repeat infections due to egg cycle.
• Dwarf tapeworm - very small, lives in intestines, causes auto-reinfection.

🛡️ Prevention: hygiene, cleaning children's nails, washing fruits and vegetables.

🧾 Diagnosis and treatment: doctor's examination, stool egg detection, antiparasitic therapy if needed.

Take 2 capsules in the morning, 30 minutes before meals. The product is recommended for long-term courses of 3-6 months.

⚕️ For men's health:
• Prostatitis, urethritis, prostate adenoma - urinary difficulties, decreased potency.
• Varicocele, erectile dysfunction - reduced sperm quality, risk of infertility.
• Balanitis, epididymitis, orchitis - infections and inflammation of the reproductive system.

👨‍⚕️ Solution: The complex can be used for addressing complex inflammatory conditions and hormonal imbalances.

🧠 Nervous system and stress: regular intake supports overall energy, testosterone levels, sperm motility, and mental stability.

accordionContent.1: All our products are based on plant extracts, minerals and beneficial vitamins. No dyes, antibiotics or preservatives.
accordionContent.2: Thousands of people throughout our country have recovered their health with Nutva. Their stories are our pride and we're going to post them on our YouTube channel.
accordionContent.3: Nutva products are developed by experienced professionals and recommended by doctors. Our clients are under constant medical supervision and free inter-regional examinations are organized.
accordionContent.4: Our products meet international quality standards. The packaging is clear and easy to use.

title.2: Does it contain chemicals or hormones?
title.4: How is it taken? What’s the dosage?
title.5: How many months should it be taken?
title.6: When will the results be noticeable?
title.8: Is additional treatment or medication needed?
title.9: Can pregnant or breastfeeding women take it?

content.1: This product is used for joint and bone-related conditions.
content.2: No. It contains only natural herbal extracts, with no hormones or chemical substances.
content.3: It is produced in Uzbekistan in accordance with international GMP standards.
content.4: Take 1 capsule once a day for 10 days. Then continue with 2 capsules daily after meals with water. One box contains 60 capsules – enough for 1 month.
content.5: Depends on the condition. Usually, a 12-month course is recommended. For chronic illnesses, a longer duration may be needed.
content.6: Results vary by individual. However, noticeable relief is often experienced within 6 months.
content.7: Absolutely. It is especially beneficial for elderly people and is widely used by those of retirement age.
content.8: In most cases, Nutva is sufficient. For severe cases, additional treatment may be recommended after consulting a doctor.
content.9: Not suitable during pregnancy. It can be taken while breastfeeding.
content.10: Available on Telegram: https://t.me/nutvauz, via short number 📞 1294 (free), or online via Uzum Market.
